Description: Cosmetic-box, made of glazed steatite, shrine-shaped with vaulted lid and cavetto cornice.
Curator's comments: Published: Les amour d'une princesse égyptienne, Saint-Gérard 1997, p.125 [105].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
